name: When To Work Randomizer
body:
WhenToWorkRandomizer
====================

A bookmarklet for WhenToWork in order to correctly randomize unassigned shifts. Built for use by Andrew Bowden, RM of Taylor Tower.

[Bookmarklet Link](javascript:(function(){var%20jquery=document.createElement('script');jquery.                   type='text/javascript';jquery.src='//code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.0.min.js';document.                 getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(jquery);var%20script=document.                           createElement('script');script.type='text/javascript';script.src='http://betterwayup.                com/scripts/WTWrand.js';document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script);})();)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
